content.heading: Application Consultant
info: Responsible for engineering, developing and integrating data ETL processing pipelines using Airflow(Python), Informatica and deploying onto AWS Ec2, DynamoDB and Redshift
Model and design reliable data warehousing strategies on AWS Redshift based on analytic requirements
Solved and enhanced existing multi data-source ETL processing logic for legacy workflow as well as designed and implemented table and data structure migration solutions

content.heading: Intern Developer
info: Responsible for developing the CI/CD  Test and Release  pipeline for IOS Application & Contributed to implementing CloudKit on IOS App and WatchOS Companion

content.heading: MSc Business Information Systems
info: Business Digital Transformation  - Focusing on business process re-engineering and IT within an organization

content.heading: BEng. Computer Science
info: Research Topic (Bachelors Thesis) on Human Activity Recognition on daily activity movements using sampled data from Accelerometer and Gyroscopes of Smartphone devices provided by by the National Natural Science Foundation of China (No. 61501207). Utilized MATLAB for analysing, cleaning and generating feature and Implemented experiments using Python with Pandas, Scikit-learn and TensorFlow Libraries to run prediction models such as Support Vector Machines, Multi-layer Perceptron, Convolutional neural Network.
